snippet.title: Morbid: The Lords of Ire | Coming May 17
snippet.description:
The Lords of Ire wait for no one.

The fight against evil approaches faster than ever, Striver. Take up arms and risk insanity as Morbid: The Lords of Ire comes to Steam, Epic, PS5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One on May 17th, 2024.

Risk insanity in the gruesome slash-em-up Morbid: The Lords of Ire, with brutal combat and souls-like elements. Defeat the five Lords of Ire as you fight for your life across tortured landscapes, rending the evil Gahars of their flesh-bound forms.

Wishlist now on:
Steam: https://bit.ly/MTLOI-Steam
PS5: https://bit.ly/MTLOI-PS5D
Switch: https://bit.ly/MTLOI-Switch

Follow Morbid: The Lords of Ire on social media: https://linktr.ee/morbidthegame
